name: Iron Forge
pages: The Iron forge is 1.33x more faster than the vanilla furnace, with 2 additional smelting slots, below is the recipe for it. This forge can use any of these $(l:upgrades)upgrades/$, and requires the $(l:patchouli:furnaces/iron_furnace)iron furnace /$ to craft. Additionally it requires 3 $(l:patchouli:items/iron_conductor_block)iron conductor blocks/$ in its recipe.
